players.name: Alice
memory: Diana: "I saw Bob last night and he seemed fine. I have no idea what happened to him."
Charlie: "I investigated Alice and found out she is the mafioso. Bob's death might be related to her. Diana, can you confirm if you saw anything suspicious last night?"
Votes: Alice voted for Charlie, Charlie voted for Diana, Diana voted for Alice
